description: Request evaluation of maintenance requirement rules for equipment.
permissions: User must be an admin to create a maintenance requirement rule evaluation clerk.
side_effects: Triggers an async maintenance requirement rule evaluation for the equipment; creates maintenance requirement rule evaluation records and may create maintenance requirement sets and maintenance work orders when rules are due and auto-create is enabled.
validation_notes: --equipment is required and must be non-empty; server raises an error if equipment_id is missing.
